remarks: The interior of a subset of a topology's base set is the union of all the open sets it includes.  Definition of interior of [Munkres] p. 94. (Contributed by NM, 10-Sep-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2013.)
statement:
iscld.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
ntrval $p |- ( ( J e. Top /\ S C_ X ) -> ( ( int ` J ) ` S ) = U. ( J i^i ~P S ) ) $.
